thread.title: BRIEF-Zuora Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $100 Million

title: BRIEF-Zuora Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $100 Million

organizations.name: allen & company llc are among underwriters

text: March 16, 2018 / 8:11 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Zuora Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $100 Million Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - * ZUORA INC FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $100 MILLION – SEC FILING * ZUORA INC SAYS IT INTENDS TO APPLY TO HAVE ITS COMMON STOCK LISTED ON NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE UNDER THE SYMBOL “ZUO” * ZUORA INC SAYS GOLDMAN SACHS & CO. LLC, MORGAN STANLEY, ALLEN & COMPANY LLC ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * ZUORA INC SAYS JEFFERIES, CANACCORD GENUITY, NEEDHAM & COMPANY ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO * ZUORA INC SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE Source text: bit.ly/2GyZkfQ
